title: MC_ReadParameter_SML (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK FINAL MC_ReadParameter_SML
Reads the value of a SoftMotion or axis specific parameter.
For the list of all SoftMotion parameter numbers see
Axis_REF_SML
.
The value of parameters is converted to
LREAL
.
To read an axis specific parameter, the axis specific parameter number must be negated.
For CANOpen based parameter, the axis specific parameter number is built from the
object number 16#ABCD (2 Bytes) and the subindex 16#EF (1 Byte): 16#ABCDEF.
Example: read object 16#6070, subindex 0: ParameterNumber:= -16#607000.
Note
Axis specific parameters are interpreted as unsigned values and converted
to
LREAL
.

rows.Name: Enable
rows.Comment: Get value is updated continuously while enabled

rows:
The FB is not finished and new output values are to be
expected
The value of the parameter, converted toLREAL
